messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE REPORT: #P-2578-RQ DATE: 09/15/34  The mysterious disappearance of noted scientist Dr. Angela Marsden from her lab at Newlight Research Center is making headlines. Dr. Marsden was working on a groundbreaking renewable energy project when she vanished without a trace.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  LEAD DETECTIVE: Detective L. M. N. Watson has taken the helm of this case. With over 20 years on the force, Watson's ability to find the missing links in perplexing cases is unparalleled. FORENSIC LEAD: Detective O. P. Q. Stuart specializes in forensic research. Currently, Stuart's team is going through Dr. Marsden's lab to uncover any overlooked evidence. SECURITY & SURVEILLANCE: Captain R. S. T. Vega is managing the review of surveillance tapes from the vicinity of Newlight Research Center. All available footage from the night of the disappearance is being meticulously analyzed. PATROL OFFICER: Patrol Officer U. V. W. Ellis, after doing his regular beat, reported seeing an unidentified vehicle near the Research Center late at night. UNDERCOVER ASSIGNMENT: Detective X. Y. Z. Blake is currently on an undercover mission at various scientific conventions. There's a suspicion that competitors might know more about Dr. Marsden's whereabouts. The city is in shock, with candlelight vigils being held all over. The mayor has offered a reward for any information leading to Dr. Marsden's safe return.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective L. M. N. Watson  
Officer Context: Detective Watson is the lead investigator for this case.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective O. P. Q. Stuart  
Officer Context: Detective Stuart is leading the forensic analysis of Dr. Marsden's lab.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Captain R. S. T. Vega  
Officer Context: Captain Vega is overseeing the surveillance tape review from the vicinity of the Research Center.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer U. V. W. Ellis  
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Ellis reported seeing an unidentified vehicle near the Research Center on the night of the disappearance.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officer

Officer Context: Detective Blake is undercover, scouting scientific conventions for potential leads.
